channel.title: Add oracle datasource to redash10
channel.description:
Hi, Need help. Trying to add oracle data source to redash 10. following this guide http://discuss.redash.io/t/add-oracle-as-data-souce-to-redash/4590/5 using redash/redash:10.0.0b50363 image and oracel instant client 21.7.0.0 after runnig docker-compose run -rm server create_db have an exception:
Traceback (most recent call last): File "/app/manage.py", line 6, in <module> from redash.cli import manager File "/app/redash/__init__.py", line 15, in <module> from .query_runner import import_query_runners File "/app/redash/query_runner/__init__.py", line 16, in <module> from redash.utils.requests_session import requests_or_advocate, requests_session, UnacceptableAddressException File "/app/redash/utils/requests_session.py", line 3, in <module> from advocate.exceptions import UnacceptableAddressException ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'advocate'
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Add oracle datasource to redash10
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
You need to run docker-compose build first.

Read full topic

item.title: Add oracle datasource to redash10
item.dc:creator: stslava
item.description:
Hi,
Need help.
Trying to add oracle data source to redash 10.
following this guide Add oracle as data souce to redash - #5 by DerBeton
using redash/redash:10.0.0b50363 image and
oracel instant client 21.7.0.0
after runnig docker-compose run -rm server create_db have an exception:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File “/app/manage.py”, line 6, in
from redash.cli import manager
File “/app/redash/init.py”, line 15, in
from .query_runner import import_query_runners
File “/app/redash/query_runner/init.py”, line 16, in
from redash.utils.requests_session import requests_or_advocate, requests_session, UnacceptableAddressException
File “/app/redash/utils/requests_session.py”, line 3, in
from advocate.exceptions import UnacceptableAddressException
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named ‘advocate’

Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
